Keep in mind that actual order delivery date will be calculated after requirements submission. If you have any questions that prevent you from submitting these requirements, please contact [Recipient] as soon as possible.
  • Your pre-existing high-resolution logo file in one of the following vector formats: .AI, .EPS, .PSD
  • Website URL
  • Examples of logo animations that you like, or any aesthetic style that you have in mind
  • Any pre-existing guidelines for colour schemes in relation to your branding
  • Brief description of your customers/target audience and any additional specific information regarding their buying habits
  • Any ethical considerations that need to be raised
  • Any aspects or elements you would like to include or avoid
